message: Hi Bob, let's start with a 60/40 split. I believe this is a fair offer to kick things off.
Let's try a 55/45 split. I think we can find a better balance.
Bob, time is ticking and our potential gains are shrinking.  I'll come up a bit to 56/44.  Let's close this deal.
I'll take a bit more, considering the inflation. 58/42 seems fair.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but this back and forth isn't helping anyone. 57/43 is my final offer.
Considering we've lost a significant amount to inflation, I think 60/40 is fair now.
